Package lib.homies.framework.scheduler

Interface SchedulerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpigotSchedulerService
public interface SchedulerService
A platform-agnostic service for scheduling tasks. This service allows framework developers to run tasks synchronously, asynchronously, with delays, or repeatedly, abstracting away platform-specific scheduler APIs.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    Builder interface for constructing and scheduling tasks with various options.

    Runs a task asynchronously (off the main server thread) immediately.

    Runs a task once after a specified delay on the main server thread.

  • Method Details

    • runLater

      HomiesTask runLater(Runnable task, long delay)
      Runs a task once after a specified delay on the main server thread.
      Parameters:
      task - The Runnable to execute.
      delay - The delay before the task runs, in server ticks (20 ticks = 1 second).
      Returns:
      A HomiesTask representing the scheduled task.

    • runRepeating

      HomiesTask runRepeating(Runnable task, long delay, long period)
      Runs a task repeatedly on the main server thread after an initial delay.
      Parameters:
      task - The Runnable to execute.
      delay - The initial delay before the first execution, in server ticks.
      period - The period between subsequent executions, in server ticks.
      Returns:
      A HomiesTask representing the scheduled task.

    • runAsync

      HomiesTask runAsync(Runnable task)
      Runs a task asynchronously (off the main server thread) immediately.
      Parameters:
      task - The Runnable to execute.
      Returns:
      A HomiesTask representing the scheduled task.

    • addToGroup

      void addToGroup(String group, HomiesTask task)
      Adds a scheduled task to a named group. Tasks in a group can be cancelled together.
      Parameters:
      group - The name of the task group.
      task - The HomiesTask to add to the group.

    • cancelGroup

      void cancelGroup(String group)
      Cancels all tasks belonging to a specific group.
      Parameters:
      group - The name of the task group to cancel.

    • cancelAll

      void cancelAll()
      Cancels all tasks scheduled by the framework for the current plugin.

    • task

      SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder task()
      Provides a builder for creating more complex scheduled tasks.
      Returns:
      A SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder instance.
